collection:
[Tides Anywhere: Privacy Policy](./)

  * [_file_download_ Download](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.hamandmore.mic)

This privacy policy will explain how Tides Anywhere uses the personal data we
collect from you when you use our website and app.

Tides Anywhere collects no personal data and sends no personal information to
any servers.

Used selected location information is sent to the server to
download relevant weather, tidal and bathymetric data, to enable the app to
calculate tide information.

Web logs are stored that indicate an IP address and date/time when accessing
the web site.
No personal information is requested or stored.
sharing:
